name: Alien Invasion (itch) (JoaoNoronha)
description: For this project, I created a single-level arcade-inspired game that is meant to evoke a sense of nostalgia. Using the Unity game engine and assets such as Sunny Land and Warped Caves, I developed a game that pays homage to a beloved childhood character with its choice of background music, Sonic: After the Sequel. The result is a nostalgicically charged game that is sure to bring back memories for players of all ages.
